definition: The term "funktional" refers to something that is designed or intended to serve a specific purpose or function. It is commonly used to describe objects, systems, or designs that prioritize practicality and efficiency over aesthetics or decorative elements. This word is often employed in the context of engineering, architecture, or product design to emphasize the emphasis on functionality and usability.

examples.german: Die Website hat ein funktionales Design.
examples.english: The website has a functional design.

examples.german: Die neue Software ist funktional und benutzerfreundlich.
examples.english: The new software is functional and user-friendly.

examples.german: Die Funktionalität des Produkts wurde verbessert.
examples.english: The functionality of the product has been improved.
The functional requirements have been met.
